text: Atrivim Senakerip Lakisɨn nguibamɨn iti, ezɨ Hesekia kamaghɨn a bagha akam amada, “Kɨ nɨn akam batuegha, datɨrɨghɨn osɨmtɨzim iti. Ezɨ kɨ kamaghsua, nɨ na ko mɨsoghan markɨ. Egh nan kantri ateghtɨ, kɨ kamaghɨn damuam, nɨ bizir manam bagh azangsɨghtɨ, kɨ nɨ danɨngam.” Ezɨ Senakerip 10,000 kilogrem silva ko 1,000 kilogrem gol uabɨ danɨngasa Hesekia mɨgei.
